Data Fields
eccDspErrInfo Struct Reference
CSL ARCH Module » C66x » ECC

Structure holding the DSP ECC Error Information. More...

#include <dsp_ecc.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t errAddress
 
uint32_t errRamOrCache
 
uint32_t errL2BitPosition
 
uint32_t errL2Type
 
uint32_t errL2way
 
uint32_t errL2CorrectableCount
 
uint32_t errL2NonCorrectableCount
 

Detailed Description

Structure holding the DSP ECC Error Information.

Field Documentation

uint32_t eccDspErrInfo::errAddress

L1P and L2: Contains the upper 27 bit of error location.

uint32_t eccDspErrInfo::errL2BitPosition

L2 only: 0: Bit Position = 0 1: Bit Position = 1 ... 255: Bit Position = 255 L1P : Value returned is always 0

uint32_t eccDspErrInfo::errL2CorrectableCount

Correctable Parity Error Count

uint32_t eccDspErrInfo::errL2NonCorrectableCount

Non-Correctable Parity Error count

uint32_t eccDspErrInfo::errL2Type

L2 Only : 0: Single Bit Error 1: Double Bit Error 3: Error in parity value, data is correct 2: Reserved L1P : Value returned is always 0

uint32_t eccDspErrInfo::errL2way

L2 Only : 00: Error detected in Way 0 of L2 cache 01: Error detected in Way 1 of L2 cache 10: Error detected in Way 2 of L2 cache 11: Error detected in Way 3 of L2 cache (Note: L2WAY = 00 when RAM = 1) L1P : Value returned is always 0

uint32_t eccDspErrInfo::errRamOrCache

L1P and L2: 0: Error detected in L1P/L2 cache 1: Error detected in L1P/L2 RAM
